contexts.context: ...amount of suspicion. Don't be surprised or insulted if the <mark>shopkeepers</mark> follow you around the shop, assuming you're going to steal...
...the Summurset Isles. Of course, I don't know any <mark>shopkeepers</mark> anywhere, no matter their open-mindedness, who aren't...
...or a Bosmer enters their shop. Even Khajiiti and Bosmeri <mark>shopkeepers</mark>.
